amendment.description: To modify the spending-neutral reserve fund reauthorizing funding for payments to counties and other units of local government to include the option of payment at levels roughly equivalent to property tax revenues lost due to the presence of Federal land.

vote.text: Amendment SA 750 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 126.

action.text: Amendment SA 750 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S1979-1980, S1995; text: CR S1979; text as modified: CR S1995) To modify the spending-neutral reserve fund reauthorizing funding for payments to counties and other units of local government to include the option of payment at levels roughly equivalent to property tax revenues lost due to the presence of Federal land.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 750 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 126.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 750 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 126.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 750 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee.
